column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I had the classic personal size deep dish. I think it's so much better than Giordanos. The crust is crunchier and not oily or soggy. The only downside is the wait time for pizza. Keep in mind
column2: I'm from NY. 45 minute wait for anything is just unacceptable. But since I'm in Chicago
column3: do as the Chicagoans do! But seriously
column4: waiting for this pizza is like waiting on line at Six Flags-45 minute wait and ate that $hit in 1 minute!
